subSections.title: Translingual
subSections.text: {{ja-forms|親|[[亲]]|親}} <!-- Note difference between Japanese and traditional Chinese -->

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[intimate]]; [[bosom]]; [[closely]] [[acquainted]]; [[beloved]]; [[dear]]
# [[parent]](s); [[father]] and/or [[mother]]
# [[relative]]s; [[blood]] or [[marriage]] [[relation]]
# [[related]] by [[blood]]; [[blood]] (brothers, sisters)
# [[marriage]]; [[matrimony]]
# to be [[close]] to; to become [[intimate]] with
# to [[fraternise]] with; to [[support]] or [[endorse]]; [[pro-]]
# to [[approach]]; to [[go]] [[near]]; to get [[in touch]] with
# to [[kiss]]; to [[brush]] one's [[lip]]s against
# [[personally]]; [[in person]]; with one's own (body part)
# [[close]] [[person]]; [[reliable]] person; [[intimate]] [[friend]]
# [[accurate]]; [[true]]
# 34th [[tetragram]] of the [[Taixuanjing]]; "[[kinship]]" ([[𝌧]])
# {{lb|zh|Internet|customer service}} [[dear]] [[sir]] or [[madam]]
# {{zh-alt-form|新|to [[renew]]; to [[replace]]}}
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

subSections.title: Readings
Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|おや}}
From {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=おや}}. Cognate with or derived from {{etyl|ojp|-}} verb {{m|ja|老ゆ|tr=oyu||to become old|pos=modern {{m|ja|老いる}} ''oiru''}}, from the idea of one's {{m|en|elder|elders}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>
